wikipedia_page.main: Brenda Jagger (born 9 July 1936 in Yorkshire, England – d. 1986) was a British writer of 9 historical romance novels. In 1986, her last novel A Song Twice Over won the Romantic Novel of the Year Award by the Romantic Novelists' Association.

response: * The Clouded Hills, a 1980 romance novel by English writer Brenda Jagger
*     1986: A Song Twice Over by Brenda Jagger (Collins)
